Token.Abstract: Only called when the full process of downloading, unzipping and installation completed successfully

Parameter.Name: package
Parameter.Abstract: The package for which the installation finished

Token.Abstract: Only called when something went wrong during installation

Parameter.Name: package
Parameter.Abstract: The package for which the installation failed

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Pointer to an error object*

Token.Abstract: Called when a download of a package finished successfully

Parameter.Name: package
Parameter.Abstract: The package for which the download finished

Token.Abstract: Only called when a download of a package failed, see error pointer.

Parameter.Name: package
Parameter.Abstract: The package for which the download failed

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Pointer to an error object

Token.Abstract: Called whenever the download of a package received bytes. Note: Total bytes can be 0 throughout a download if the response does not contain a Content-Length header.

Parameter.Name: package
Parameter.Abstract: The package for which the download progress occured

Parameter.Name: downloadedBytes
Parameter.Abstract: Download progress in bytes

Parameter.Name: totalBytes
Parameter.Abstract: Total size of the download in bytes

Token.Abstract: Only called when the process of unzipping finished successfully

Parameter.Name: package
Parameter.Abstract: The package for which the unzip process finished

Token.Abstract: Only called when the process of unzipping failed

Parameter.Name: package
Parameter.Abstract: The package for which the unzip process failed

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Pointer to an error object

Token.Abstract: Called whenever the process of unzipping reports a progress in bytes

Parameter.Name: package
Parameter.Abstract: The package for which the unzip progress occured

Parameter.Name: unzippedBytes
Parameter.Abstract: Unzip progress in bytes

Parameter.Name: totalBytes
Parameter.Abstract: Total size of the unzipping operation

Token.Abstract: When a package is installed the root object of an unzipped package should be a folder named with the standard identifier(<NAME>-<OS>-<RESOLUTION>).

Parameter.Name: package
Parameter.Abstract: The package for which the unzipped folder name should be determined

Parameter.Name: packageContens
Parameter.Abstract: A list of URLs of unzipped package's first level directory

ReturnValue.Abstract: The folder name of the package

Token.Abstract: Provide this method if you want to set a password to unzip a protected zip archive.

Parameter.Name: package
Parameter.Abstract: The package for which the password should be set

ReturnValue.Abstract: The password to be used to unzip a package archive

Token.Abstract: Provides the request before it is sent to let delegate adjust headers etc. If there is a partial download which should be resumed a Range header will be set after this invocation.

Parameter.Name: request
Parameter.Abstract: The request object that will be used for the download

Parameter.Name: download
Parameter.Abstract: The download object which will start with the given request
